Pre-Game Insights: Arber Hoxha - who plays for Croatian giants Dinamo Zagreb - could be called upon to deputise against some familiar faces.
Ernest Muci is another contender for the starting lineup.
Rey Manaj is also vying for promotion from the bench, after Chelsea's Armando Broja failed to make much of an impact in Dortmund.
Winger Jasir Asani - a key player in qualifying - has recovered from an ankle injury and may still start in the final third.
Albania's Nedim Bajrami took just 23 seconds to score the fastest goal in European Championship history.
